detected_errors.description: More than 50% of rooms/spaces present in the 2D floor plan (e.g., garage, multiple bedrooms, theatre, alfresco, verandah/portico, multiple baths/WC, laundry, activity) are missing from the 3D render, indicating it is not a faithful 2D-to-3D conversion of the provided plan.

summary: Although the second image is genuinely 3D, it does not correspond to the provided 2D floor plan and omits the majority of the plan’s rooms, triggering automatic rejection.
